elements.description: Input field to search for employees by name.

elements.name: Employee Id Input
elements.description: Input field to search for employees by ID.

elements.description: Dropdown to filter employees by employment status.

elements.description: Input field to search for employees by supervisor name.

elements.description: Dropdown to filter employees by job title.
